intro.p1: Hello, I am currently a master's student who graduated from National Cheng Kung University. I am passionate about programming and very eager to learn various programming languages and frameworks. My experience includes:
intro.l1: Full-stack web, including my portfolio you are currently browsing.
intro.l2: VR application for navigating BIM models.
intro.l3: MR application for human-robot collaboration interface.
intro.l4: Arduino, driver and controller for a four mecanum wheel system.
intro.l5: Robot, autonomous navigation platform using ROS framework.
intro.l6: Analysis software, point cloud processing program.
intro.p2: I developed a passion for programming during my research, and improved my skills through self-learning and coursework. I enjoy exploring different languages and frameworks, and have experience adapting quickly to new tasks. During my graduate studies, I actively participated in multiple research projects and gained practical experience in development.
intro.p3: If you are looking for an experienced and passionate developer, I believe I could be a great fit for you. Thank you for taking the time to read this, and I look forward to the opportunity to contribute my development skills to your project.
